head.title: Welcome to WSO2 Identity Server v2.0.0!

body.p: Users can login to Identity Provider (IdP) and manage their identity.

li.a: How to get a Managed Card?
How to get an OpenID Information Card?
How to register with a Personal Card?
How to register your trusted Relying Party?

body.p: You can login to IdP in four ways - one is to use your username/password and another is to use a registered personal card. Also you can use either an OpenID or an OpenID Information Card issued from WSO2 IdP, First obtain a username/password from IdP administrator. Now you can login using that. Please check here for more details on registering your personal card. Once you register your personal card, you can login using that.

h3.a: How to get a Managed Card?

body.p: After you login click on [1] shown in the figure below. It will download a managed card.

h3.a: How to get an OpenID Information Card?

body.p: After you login click on [1] shown in the figure below. It will download an OpenID Information Card card.

h3.a: How to register your personal card?

body.p: Create a personal card for yourself.

Then obtain a username/password from IdP administrator and login using that. Then click on [1] shown in the figure below. This will register your personal card. All personal cards registerd under your username/password will be displayed in [2] in the figure below. By clicking on [3] you can download the managed card relating to your personal card.
